title: @Riot Nendoroid Ahri figure

embed.description: We're excited to bring back this premium Nendoroid Ahri figure, produced in collaboration with Good Smile. This Nendoroid is highly posable and comes with swappable arms, face, and tail, allowing you to act out a variety of different sce

body:
Merch Store says you're bringing back the Nendoroid Ahri figure, do you have a date for when it's coming back?

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gkg9n1t6lBk/WS4jzOUOfiI/AAAAAAAAmFg/1F96k8zK-K8GFyLF7O5zZNudHgwLe6wXwCLcB/s1600/ahri_pose1_nobase.png

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-p7aStAKfd4

replies.body:
https://youtu.be/dUk4nM0zKnI?t=10s

Sadly, I don't have any more information on when exactly she'll be back. I just know that she is indeed going to be back in stock at some point in the soon-ish™ future.

Does it mean this year or this months ?  
 Awww... I can´t wait {{champion:103}} <3  xD I looking every day three times for her ._.
